SummaryEnglish: Momo, a little orphan girl, lives in the ruins of an old amphitheater in a small town. Her extraordinary ability to listen draws people to her and she has many wonderful friends. One day she becomes aware that something has changed. Looking further into this, she comes across the "Grey Lords", a powerful secret organization that is aggressively influencing people to save time and give it to them.

1.SummaryEnglish: Momo arrives in the city and meets Cassiopeia and Beppo. Beppo wants to prevent, that Momo is taken to an orphanage and tells her about other children and the amphitheater.

2.SummaryEnglish: Momo has her new home in the amphitheater- to the dislike of Gigi. While she helps the inhabitants to settle their quarrels by only listening to them, Grey Men are scurrying through the city.

3.SummaryEnglish: Fusi is visited by a Grey Men in his barber shop, who makes up his life-time calculation. Momo watches the scene and wants to tell Gigi about it.

4.SummaryEnglish: The children are playing the South Sea game in the amphitheater and when Momo appears, the game becomes an adventurous expedition.

5.SummaryEnglish: Momo goes with her friends to school and the have a lot of fun during the lessons. But suddenly two Grey Men appear to persuade the teacher to save time.

6.SummaryEnglish: Nino, who has been visited by a Grey Men, expels his Uncle Ettore and the other old men out of his restaurant. Momo has to find a way to bring them back together.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Grey Men, who are aware, that Momo is a great threat, assign the Agent100 for the case. He tries to persuade Momo with a doll called "Bibigirl", but Momo's will is stronger.

9.TitleEnglish: Momo and the Grey Men's Fairground
9.SummaryEnglish: Momo wants to tell the children everything she knows about the Grey Men. But the Grey Men try to prevent that by setting up a fairground and luring the children away from Momo

10.SummaryEnglish: Together with the children Momo is preparing a children's demonstration to warn the inhabitants about the Grey Men. Unfortunately the grown ups don ́t pay any attention to them.

11.SummaryEnglish: Momo is persuaded by Cassiopeia to leave the amphitheater just in time, before the Grey Men arrive there. Beppo, who witnessed the big tribunal of the Grey Men, thinks that they have kidnapped Momo.

12.SummaryEnglish: The Grey Men are chasing Momo, but she manages to escape thanks to Cassiopeia's gift to look into the future. Meanwhile Beppo asks Gigi to help him find Momo.

13.SummaryEnglish: Momo meets Master Hora and learns everything about the secret and the origin of time. Gigi delays his search for Momo to go to a TV-casting and Beppo is taken away to a mental institution.

15.SummaryEnglish: Momo awakens in the amphitheater and sees, that the city has changed completely. It doesn't take long For the Gery Men to realize, that Momo is back, while she finds out, that she has slept for a whole year.

16.SummaryEnglish: Momo finds Nino's new fast-food restaurant. But Nino doesn't have any time for her and then there are these two Grey Men.

17.SummaryEnglish: Momo goes to Gigi's house, who meanwhile became a big TV-star. Even he is so busy, that Momo has to admit to herself, that she also lost Gigi to the Grey Men. Agent 1313, who is accompanying Momo, has no good intentions in mind.

18.SummaryEnglish: While Momo is on her way to the mental institution to find Beppo, he is discharged by the Grey Men, who made a deal with him. Momo just misses him.

19.SummaryEnglish: Momo is at the TV-station, because she wants to ask Gigi to help her find Beppo. In front of the cameras she appeals to the viewers. The Grey Men start chasing Momo, but they can only capture Cassiopeia.

20.SummaryEnglish: The Grey Men have Cassiopeia and are trying to persuade her to tell them, how to get to Master Hora. But Momo manages to free Cassiopeia.

21.SummaryEnglish: Momo goes with her friends home to spend some time with them. She succeeds in bringing back the cheerful mood. But the Grey Men are watching them and are ready to make their next step.

22.SummaryEnglish: Momo is waiting for her friends. She decides to go to the children's depot. But she is discovered and has to escape again. The president himself approaches her to make her a proposal.

23.TitleEnglish: Momo and the Grey Men's Offer
23.SummaryEnglish: After Momo has not accepted the president ́s proposal, she is locked away in a cell. She manages to escape, but has no idea, that this was the intention of the Grey Men. They want Momo to lead them directly to Master Hora.

24.SummaryEnglish: Momo arrives at Master Hora ́s house. The Grey Men instead cannot follow her through the never-lane, because the would start to disappear. Master Hora needs Momo's help to beat the Grey Men. She bravely agrees.

25.SummaryEnglish: Master Hora shows Momo the hour flowers to explain her, where her own time comes from. While she is still enchanted by the sight of the hour flowers, she falls asleep.

26.SummaryEnglish: Momo sneaks into the hiding-place of the Grey Men. The Grey Men disappear one by one and Momo manages to free the frozen hour flowers. Time and Life starts to blossom again.
